update clien_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_time = #{contactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, customer_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scale_of_company = #{scaleOfCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnvisit_time = #{returnvisitTime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.*,u.id user.id,u.username user.username FROM clien_info c INNER JOIN user_info u ON c.uid=u.id where c.`name` LIKE BINARY '%%'
AND c.source IN (#{source})
AND c.customer_type IN (#{constomerType})
AND c.`status` IN (#{status})
LIMIT #{offset}
